parameters.name: Layout
parameters.description: ID of the drawing view to move to the drawing sheet

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x coordinate where to drop the drawing view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y coordinate where to drop the drawing view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z coordinate where to drop the drawing view ; this coordinate is always 0

,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
)

parameters.description: y coordinate where to drop the drawing view
